channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The resident at 6 broadlands avenue, enfield, EN3 areaalways leave their bin on the road, 28th February
item.description:
The resident of 6, broadlands avenue, Enfield always places his blue bin on the road so that he can use his driveway. Please note that his curb is not dropped and therefore he is driving on the pavement to enter his driveway. There is also a parking just infront of that house which is always blocked no matter what days of the week it is therefore blocking other users from parking their car

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Broadlands Avenue, Enfield
Report on FixMyStreet
